name: Jumble Up
description:
Jumble Up is a jigsaw puzzle written in STOS.

The game loads a user supplied image and creates a puzzle with 50 pieces out of it. The game can load Degas-files in both low and high resolution or low resolution Neochrom images. Left click and hold the mouse button to select and move a piece; if you drop it in the right place it will stay there, otherwise it will return to where it came from. Right clicking while playing will show you how the picture looks like unscrambled

The game comes with three pictures.

shot.caption: The selected picture is totally scrambled
Now the image starts to take form
